dmca.title: [ABUSE] Ongoing copyright infringement
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, February 14, 2005 1:21 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Ongoing copyright infringement




-- 
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: cservice <cservice@direcway.com>
To: abuse@servermatrix.com
Date: Monday, February 14, 2005, 12:31:30 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] Ongoing copyright infringement

===8<==============Original message text===============
From R Hammendorp

Unlimited Desires

RH Productions

To servermatrix

cc to copyright@theplanet.com

Attention to : Lance Crosby, JD General Councel and Vice President of
Operations.

Cease and desist for http://www.slavesinpain.com

The website slavesinpain.com you are currently hosting is using pictures
which I produced and own the copyright of. 

The URL of these pictures is;

http://www.slavesinpain.com/SilentScreams/Gallery_106/page_106.htm 



         The pictures in question are the last two pictures located on the
second row,

         and the entire lower row on this gallerie webpage.

         The pictures have been cropped to remove the copyright information.



This use of these graphics is not authorized by me. The operator of this
website neither asked for nor received permission to use the pictures,
graphics or text} nor to make or distribute copies of it. Therefore, I
believe that the operator of this website has willfully infringed my rights
under 17 USC
